preReadQuiz.description: Take this quiz to test your understanding of JavaScript Promises (Advanced)!

questions.description: What, if anything, is wrong with the below code snippet?
questions.explanation: If 'somethingComplicated()' throws an error, there is no 'catch' statement on its containing promise that will 'catch' the error.

choices.value: It will throw a syntax error
Any error raised in the somethingComplicated() method will not get caught.

questions.description: True or false? Promise.all is rejected if any of the elements are rejected.
questions.explanation: If any promise provided to Promise.all rejects, the promise it returns will also be rejected.

questions.description: What gets logged to the console in the Promise.race function?
questions.explanation: As 'p2' resolves first with a value of 'two', that is what Promise.race will resolve with.
